on reading compounds: 呼吸【コキュウ】breathing, respiration, knack, trick, secret (of doing something), harmony, balance, synchronization, accord, short interval, short pause
呼応【コオウ】hailing each other, acting in concert, responding (to), sympathizing (with), agreement, concord
kun reading compounds: 呼ぶ【よぶ】to call out (to), to call, to invoke, to summon (a doctor, etc.), to invite, to designate, to name, to brand, to garner (support, etc.), to gather, to take as one's wife
呼子鳥【よぶこどり】calling bird (esp. a cuckoo)
